mapper.select: SELECT T2.* FROM (SELECT T1.* , FLOOR((ROWNUM - 1) / #{pageSize} + 1 ) AS PAGE FROM (SELECT B.SEQ_ID ,B.ICCIM_SEQ_ID ,B.MEDIUM_CODE ,B.MEDIUM_TYPE ,B.MEDIUM_CODE_KOR_NAME ,B.MEDIUM_CODE_ENG_NAME ,B.DESCRIPTION ,B.USE_YN ,B.USE_YN as USE_YN_CHANGED ,B.ORDER_NUM ,B.CREATE_DATE ,B.CREATED_BY ,B.LAST_UPDATE_DATE ,B.LAST_UPDATE_BY FROM ITSM_COM_CODE_INFO_MASTER A, ITSM_COM_CODE_INFO_DETAIL B WHERE 1 = 1 AND A.SEQ_ID = B.ICCIM_SEQ_ID AND A.SEQ_ID = #{p_seq_id} ORDER BY B.ORDER_NUM ) T1 ) T2 WHERE PAGE = #{curPageNo}
SELECT COUNT(*) AS CNT FROM ITSM_COM_CODE_INFO_MASTER A ,ITSM_COM_CODE_INFO_DETAIL B WHERE 1 = 1 AND A.SEQ_ID = B.ICCIM_SEQ_ID AND A.SEQ_ID = #{p_seq_id}
